# enable HA need reboot filer
options cf.mode ha

# cluster failover
cf status
cf enable
cf disable
cf takeover
cf giveback

# sp login with naroot
system console

# modify hostname must last line enter empty with wrfile
> rdfile /etc/rc   
#Auto-generated by setup Wed Jul  3 23:53:15 GMT 2019
hostname fas2240a
ifconfig e0M `hostname`-e0M mtusize 1500
route add default 192.168.6.1 1
routed on
options dns.enable off
options nis.enable off
savecore

> wrfile /etc/rc 
#Auto-generated by setup Wed Jul  3 23:53:15 GMT 2019
hostname fas2240a
ifconfig e0M `hostname`-e0M mtusize 1500
route add default 192.168.6.1 1
routed on
options dns.enable off
options nis.enable off
savecore
